body: the guy below got scholarship for erotica

When the subject of a hentai is a submissive woman, and you tag the content "femdom" while omitting a "yuri" tag, you essentially render the former meaningless, because by the underlying logic of the loose definition of femdom being employed here, the vast majority of lesbian porn constitutes "female dominance" in some capacity, and as a result, most femdom is an all-female affair, diluting the tag to oblivion.

If you're not going to at least tag this as yuri to help distinguish the redundant female-on-female "femdom" from work that more accurately conforms to the spirit of the concept female dominance (ie. porn involving dominance by the female gender over the male gender), then add a "lezdom" tag to the equation that you can desecrate to your heart's content, and keep your grubby dike fingers off of the femdom tag. 

Thanks.
